author: Special Correspondent
text:
Thousands of devotees from various parts of the country thronged the pilgrim island on Monday and took a holy dip in ‘Agni Theertham’ sea in front of Sri Ramanathaswamy Temple on the occasion of ‘Mahodaya Amavasai’, a rare amavasai that occurs in the Tamil month of Thai once in decades.

Devotees made a beeline for Agni Theertham in the island, and two other sacred bathing places at Sethukarai near Sri Adi Jagannatha Perumal Temple in Tirupullani and Navapashanam sea temple in Devipattinam right from the early hours, and performed ‘tharpanam’, paying obeisance to their ancestors and seeking their blessings.

There was a sea of humanity on the shores.es.
title: Thousands take dip in sea on ‘Thai Amavasai’
